response.overview: In Chile, two decades after the end of the Military Dictatorship, two doctors from a University Hospital and a group of students are surprised by the arrival of two psychiatric patients, former repressive agents of the military regime. The curiosity of the students involves the doctors, establishing a dark bond between them. Deeply autobiographical, the film was written, directed, and acted by doctors.
response.title: The Acrobat in the Tunnel
